title: VSD Statistics (Elasticsearch)
description: Specify configuration for Nuage VSD stats (VSTAT).

hostname.title: Hostname
hostname.description: Management network host name for the VSTAT

mgmt_ip.title: Management IP address
mgmt_ip.description: Management network IP address for the VSTAT

mgmt_ip_prefix.title: Management Network Prefix Length
mgmt_ip_prefix.description: Management network prefix length for the VSTAT

mgmt_gateway.title: Management Network Gateway
mgmt_gateway.description: Management network gateway for the VSTAT

vmname.title: VM name
vmname.description: Name of the Virtual Machine on the Hypervisor

upgrade_vmname.title: Upgrade VM name
upgrade_vmname.description: Virtual Machine name of the new Stats VM. Used during Upgrade only

target_server_type.description: Type of hypervisor environment into which the instance will be created
target_server_type.title: Target Server type

target_server.title: Target Server IP or FQDN
target_server.description: Hostname or IP address of the hypervisor where VM  will be instantiated. In the case of deployment in a vCenter environment, this will be the FQDN of the vCenter Server

mgmt_bridge.title: Management Network Bridge
mgmt_bridge.description: Network Bridge used for the management interface of a component or the BOF interface on VSC. This will be a Distributed Virtual PortGroup (DVPG) when deploying on vCenter or a Linux network bridge when deploying on KVM. This field can be overridden by defining the management network bridge separately in the component configuration. Defaults to the global setting

vsd_fqdn.title: VSD FQDN
vsd_fqdn.description: FQDN of the VSD or VSD cluster for this VSTAT

vcenter_datacenter.title: vCenter Datacenter Name
vcenter_datacenter.description: Name of the vCenter Datacenter on which the VSTAT VM will be deployed. Defaults to the common vCenter Datacenter Name if not defined here.

vcenter_cluster.title: vCenter Cluster Name
vcenter_cluster.description: Name of the vCenter Cluster on which the VSTAT VM will be deployed. Defaults to the common vCenter Cluster Name if not defined here.

vcenter_datastore.title: vCenter Datastore Name
vcenter_datastore.description: Name of the vCenter Datastore on which the VSTAT VM will be deployed. Defaults to the common vCenter Datastore Name if not defined here.

aws_upgrade_ami_id.title: AWS AMI ID for Upgrading Instance
aws_upgrade_ami_id.description: AMI ID of the upgraded image

aws_instance_type.title: AWS Instance Type
aws_instance_type.description: Instance Type of the AWS Instance

aws_key_name.title: AWS Keypair Name
aws_key_name.description: Name of the Keypair used to connect to VPC

aws_mgmt_eni.title: AWS Management ENI ID
aws_mgmt_eni.description: ENI ID for VSTAT Instance on Management Subnetwork

openstack_image.title: OpenStack Image
openstack_image.description: Name of image installed on OpenStack for VSTAT

openstack_flavor.title: OpenStack Flavor
openstack_flavor.description: Name of instance flavor installed on OpenStack for VSTAT

openstack_network.title: OpenStack Network
openstack_network.description: Name of network on OpenStack for VSTAT

openstack_subnet.title: OpenStack Subnet
openstack_subnet.description: Name of subnet on OpenStack for VSTAT

openstack_port_security_groups.title: OpenStack Port Security Groups
openstack_port_security_groups.description: Set of security groups to associate with Mgmt interface
